Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I always feel...gross...after I visit that forum. Even when it's a 2 minute visit and then I remember why I'd been staying away. It strikes me as this escalating cycle of one group feeling judged, so it judges another group, who then feels attacked and judged, so they judge back even harder. It's no good for anybody, and it also seems to focus extensively on the extremes and largely ignores the broad middle way of being.
